text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version 2.7
    CodeDisplay
    2862-1Albumin [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
    61152-5Albumin [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Bromocresol purple (BCP) dye binding method
    1751-7Albumin [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    76631-1Albumin [Mass/volume] in Blood by Bromocresol purple (BCP) dye binding method
    77148-5Albumin [Mass/volume] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Bromocresol purple (BCP) dye binding method
    61151-7Albumin [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Bromocresol green (BCG) dye binding method
    61195-4Albumin [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma from Fetus
  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.mdanderson.org/oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.412.2.7.5.737384.134 version 1
    CodeDisplay
    4760Albumin

name: Albumin

description: LOINC codes indicating serum albumin measurements Adding proprietary MDA codes
